channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Multiple van loads of white goods and construction waste fly tipped throughout the day, 19th September
item.description:
A group of 3-4 men have been fly tipping waste on the old builders merchant land on green Lanes on Fri 19 Sept.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London

item.title: Street Light 261314, 19th September
item.description:

item.title: Mosque blasts prayer sounds that reach inside our home, 19th September
item.description:
A neighbourhood mosque is imposing its religious beliefs on the entire community by blasting prayer sounds that penetrate our homes. We do not consent to having religion of any kind forced upon us. Please make sure the public space is neutral.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Alarm, 19th September
item.description:
